question: I love this girl very much but she is getting married to someone else.
answer:
QUESTION
I love this girl very much but she is getting married to someone else. I realize that it is not meant to be but can I pray that she will be mine in heaven? Thanks for your help and may Allah reward you greatly for you great service to the muslim community.
ANSWER


Share:
You state you love the girl but she married another person.

Love is mutual and not unilateral. Jannah is a place of true love. Allah
will grant you a partner in Jannah who will also love you. What will you
enjoy of a person you love but she does not love you?

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
